message: Import statement for 'java.util.List' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'STANDARD_JAVA_PACKAGE' group, expecting group 'THIRD_PARTY_PACKAGE' on this line.
Import statement for 'java.util.Map' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'STANDARD_JAVA_PACKAGE' group, expecting group 'THIRD_PARTY_PACKAGE' on this line.
'org.easymock.Capture' should be separated from previous import group by one line.
'method def modifier' has incorrect indentation level 12, expected level should be one of the following: 4, 6, 8.
'method def' child has incorrect indentation level 14, expected level should be one of the following: 6, 8, 10.
'method def rcurly' has incorrect indentation level 12, expected level should be one of the following: 4, 6, 8.
'object def rcurly' has incorrect indentation level 10, expected level should be one of the following: 2, 4, 6.
Missing a Javadoc comment.
